Package library.collision

Class AABB

java.lang.Object
library.collision.AABB
public class AABB
extends java.lang.Object
Axis aligned bounding box volume class. Allows the creation of bounding volumes to make broad phase collision check possible and easy to do.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AABB()
    Default constructor generating an AABB with (0,0) upper and lower bounds.
    AABB​(Vectors2D min, Vectors2D max)
    Constructor to generate an AABB given a minimum and maximum bound in the form of two vectors.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean AABBOverLap​(AABB a, AABB b)
    Method to check if two AABB's overlap.
    static boolean AABBOverLap​(Body A, Body B)
    Checks whether two body's AABB's overlap in world space.
    boolean AABBOverLap​(Vectors2D point)
    Method to check if a point resides inside an AABB in object space.
    void addOffset​(Vectors2D offset)
    Method to add offset to the AABB's bounds.
    AABB copy()
    Copy method to return a new AABB that's the same as the current object.
    Vectors2D getMax()
    Getter for max variable for upper bound vertex.
    Vectors2D getMin()
    Getter for min variable for lower bound vertex.
    boolean isValid()
    Method to check if an AABB is valid.
    void set​(AABB aabb)
    Sets the current objects bounds equal to that of the passed AABB argument.
    java.lang.String toString()  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • AABB

      public AABB​(Vectors2D min, Vectors2D max)
      Constructor to generate an AABB given a minimum and maximum bound in the form of two vectors.
      Parameters:
      min - Lower bound of AABB vertex.
      max - Higher bound of AABB vertex.

    • AABB

      public AABB()
      Default constructor generating an AABB with (0,0) upper and lower bounds.

  • Method Details

    • set

      public final void set​(AABB aabb)
      Sets the current objects bounds equal to that of the passed AABB argument.
      Parameters:
      aabb - An AABB bounding box.

    • getMin

      public Vectors2D getMin()
      Getter for min variable for lower bound vertex.
      Returns:
      AABB min

    • getMax

      public Vectors2D getMax()
      Getter for max variable for upper bound vertex.
      Returns:
      AABB max

    • isValid

      public final boolean isValid()
      Method to check if an AABB is valid. Makes sure the bounding volume is not; a point, has order of vertex's backwards and valid values have been used for the bounds.
      Returns:
      boolean value of the validity of the AABB.

    • AABBOverLap

      public boolean AABBOverLap​(Vectors2D point)
      Method to check if a point resides inside an AABB in object space.
      Parameters:
      point - A point to check if its inside the AABB's object space. Point needs to also be in object space.
      Returns:
      Boolean value whether or not the point lies inside the AABB bounds.

    • addOffset

      public void addOffset​(Vectors2D offset)
      Method to add offset to the AABB's bounds. Can be useful to convert from object to world space .
      Parameters:
      offset - A vector to apply to the min and max vectors to translate the bounds and therefore AABB to desired position.

    • toString

      public final java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • copy

      public AABB copy()
      Copy method to return a new AABB that's the same as the current object.
      Returns:
      New AABB that's the same as the current object.

    • AABBOverLap

      public static boolean AABBOverLap​(Body A, Body B)
      Checks whether two body's AABB's overlap in world space.
      Parameters:
      A - First body to evaluate.
      B - Second body to evaluate.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of whether the two bodies AABB's overlap in world space.

    • AABBOverLap

      public static boolean AABBOverLap​(AABB a, AABB b)
      Method to check if two AABB's overlap. Can be seen as world space.
      Parameters:
      a - First AABB to evaluate.
      b - Second AABB to evaluate.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of whether two bounds of the AABB's overlap.
